arthritis.note_text: This refers only to a diagnosis given by a doctor.
arthritis.info_text:
What is arthritis?

• A condition affecting joints
• Causes long-term pain or stiffness
• Common in older adults
• Includes osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis
• This question refers to a confirmed medical diagnosis
